title: Argentina’s Javier Milei vows to pay country’s debt while shuttering the central bank
description:
Argentina’s Javier Milei vows to pay country’s debt while shuttering the central bank

Argentina’s leading presidential candidate Javier Milei pledged to close the nation’s central bank while saying he would make every effort to avoid a default on the country’s sovereign debt if he wins the October ...

title: Argentina devalues peso, raises rates after shock primary vote
description:
Argentina devalues peso, raises rates after shock primary vote

Argentina's government devalued its currency by nearly 18% on Monday while the benchmark interest rate was raised by 21 percentage points to 118%, the central bank said, as financial markets reeled the day after a shock primary election...
